ContainsHyperlink(string?)

Determines whether the specified text contains hyperlink.

public static bool ContainsHyperlink(string? text)

Parameters

text string

The text.

Returns

bool

true if the specified text contains hyperlink; otherwise, false.

GetLink(string)

Gets the link part of the first hyperlink (underlying destination, where link points and directs to after clicking).

public static string GetLink(string hyperlink)

Parameters

hyperlink string

The text containing hyperlink.

Returns

string

String with the link, if passed value contained hyperlink; otherwise Empty.

GetText(string)

Gets the text part of the first hyperlink (text that will be displayed as link).

public static string GetText(string hyperlink)

Parameters

hyperlink string

The text containing hyperlink.

Returns

string

String with the link description (visible text), if passed value contained hyperlink; otherwise Empty.

HyperlinkToText(string)

Converts the text containing hyperlink to the plain text.

public static string HyperlinkToText(string hyperlinkHeader)

Parameters

hyperlinkHeader string

The text containing hyperlink. For example header.

Returns

string

The passed text with it's first hyperlink converted.

Remarks

The first hyperlink in the given text is replaced by its text part. The rest of the passed text stays the same.

TextToHyperlink(string)

Converts text to Markdown hyperlink leading to appropriate section of the file that it will be placed in.

public static string TextToHyperlink(string text)

Parameters

text string

The text to convert.

Returns

string

Prepared hyperlink.

Remarks

The specified text is treated as text part of Markdown hyperlink. If text is a Markdown style header the leading '#' characters are previously removed. The text is also trimmed. Link leads to appropriate section of the file (that it will be place in). Name of the section is the same as the text.
